name: The Great Egg-scape
description:
The eggies of Eggleston need your help! Fling the eggies to their freedom using the slingshot and make a name for yourself on the leaderboard! Good luck!

An arcade game made for the Godot Wild Jam 28.
Theme: Egg

Made by:
SarahSsss7#9089,
Sophiablabla#7563
hnuqweasd#3731

Uses SilentWolf for the online leaderboard: https://silentwolf.com/
